This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2Pd(Pe)CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of Modulo Terminal count. More...

#include <csl_aif2.h>

Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2Pd(Pe)CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of Modulo Terminal count.

Field Documentation

Bool CSL_Aif2ModuloTc::bEnableRule

Transmission rule enable

Bool CSL_Aif2ModuloTc::bRuleObsaiCtlMsg

Bit 1: Module Rule oppeations on OBSAI control messages bit0: AxC messages

Uint16 CSL_Aif2ModuloTc::RuleIndex

Index. Transmission Rule. Index indicates at which count the rule will fire

Uint8 CSL_Aif2ModuloTc::RuleLink

Indicates which link the rule is allocated to

Uint16 CSL_Aif2ModuloTc::RuleModulo

Modulo Terminal count of the rule counter. Dictates the period of the rule. Terminal count is the OBSAI Module minus 1
